author: Pete Williams
title: Coronavirus kickbacks: FBI arrests Georgia man for large-scale unnecessary testing scam
description: FBI agents arrested a Georgia man Monday on charges he took kickbacks from medical testing firms by referring people for COVID-19 testing who didn't need it.
content:
WASHINGTON FBI agents arrested a Georgia man Monday on charges that he accepted kickbacks from medical testing companies by referring people for COVID-19 testing who didn't need it in order to fraudulently get Medicare reimbursement.
Court documents said Eri… [+1615 chars]
